title: many repeated requests to the t8n still
body:
with pyt8n which is extremely slow, this many requests make it long time to run a test generation.
this is what I get when running a single test

```
fill -v ./tests/tmp/tmptest_2298eb5b_e109_4c13_b72c_a871646a29f5/test_withdrawals.py::test_large_amount --output ./tests/tmp/out_2298eb5b_e109_4c13_b72c_a871646a29f5  --evm-bin /home/wins/.retesteth/pyt8n/start.sh --flat-output --from=Frontier --until=Shanghai
```

```
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm t8n --help                        
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm t8n --help                        
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm t8n --help                        
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm t8n --help                        
ethereum-spec-evm t8n --input.alloc=stdin --input.txs=stdin --input.env=stdin --output.result=stdout --output.alloc=stdout --output.body=stdout --state.fork=Shanghai --state.chainid=1 --state.reward=-1                
ethereum-spec-evm t8n --input.alloc=stdin --input.txs=stdin --input.env=stdin --output.result=stdout --output.alloc=stdout --output.body=stdout --state.fork=Shanghai --state.chainid=1 --state.reward=0                
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v                         
ethereum-spec-evm -v

```
